episodes.title: Inside Goenka Vipassana: The Experience That Broke Me
episodes.description:
I attended a 10-day Goenka Vipassana meditaiton retreat, expecting peace and insight - but what I experienced was intense and unsettling, and far from what most people imagine. In this personal story and expose, I reveal the hidden dangers of Goenka Vipassana, the psychological challenges I faced, and the truth behind the serene exterior.

This video covers: 

-My firsthand terrifying experience at a 10-day Vipassana retreat.
-The hidden dangers and psychological intensity of Goenka meditation.
-Reflections on what Vipassana meditation doesn't tell you
-The dangers of meditation, that nobody talks about.
-We look at the teachings of Goenka and question whether they are universal and secular or religious.

If you're curious about Goenka's Vipassana, meditation retreats, or the psychological risks of intensive meditation, this video gives an honest, personal perspective.
